hero.slogan: From residency to family, workplace, accidents, and criminal cases — Global one-stop legal solutions starting in Ansan.

introduction.title: Sejoong Law Office Ansan Branch
introduction.content: Sejoong Law Office (Sejoong Law Firm Ansan Branch) is a one-stop legal service provider based in Wongok-dong, Ansan, offering integrated services in residency/visa/nationality/permanent residence, domestic/international divorce, industrial/traffic accident compensation, wage/severance pay (unpaid) disputes, and civil/criminal cases. For clients struggling with complex procedures and language/document barriers, we provide execution-focused representation from case diagnosis to document organization, settlement/mediation, litigation, and administrative procedures, helping to quickly resolve disputes and substantially restore rights.

immigration.title: Immigration/Residency/Status
immigration.description: Residency extension, status change, registration extension, visa/nationality documents, permanent residence applications, invitation/status adjustment/various administrative document support

family.title: Domestic/International Divorce/Family
family.description: Domestic/international divorce litigation, property division, custody/alimony, adoption and adoption dissolution, family relationship matters (including China-related divorce/document issues)

compensation.title: Industrial/Traffic Accidents/Damages
compensation.description: Industrial accident compensation (workplace injuries/unpaid compensation, etc.), traffic accident compensation, settlement (proxy negotiation), damage claims, death case settlement and follow-up procedures

labor.title: Wages/Severance/Unpaid
labor.description: Workplace/business site unpaid wages, severance disputes, deposit returns and other monetary claim cases

litigation.title: Civil/Criminal
litigation.description: Assault/injury, fraud/voice phishing/online fraud, DUI and traffic accident fines/criminal procedures, sham marriage issues, criminal disposition/judgment-related applications, etc.

painPoints.title: Situations Where Sejoong Excels
painPoints.subtitle: If you're in this situation, Sejoong can help

items.title: Employment, family, and business have stopped due to residency issues.
items.description: Quick solutions for clients whose daily lives have stopped due to residency status issues

items.title: Divorce/family disputes have become more complicated due to cross-border/document issues.
items.description: Professional handling of complex legal procedures for international marriages

items.title: I had an industrial/traffic accident but don't know the compensation process.
items.description: Clear guidance on post-accident compensation procedures and maximizing compensation

items.title: I haven't received wages/severance pay and the company is holding out.
items.description: Professional service to securely recover unpaid wages and severance pay

items.title: I'm afraid of police/prosecutor procedures for criminal cases (assault/fraud/DUI, etc.).
items.description: Reducing fear of criminal procedures and professional representation for the best outcome

oneStop.title: One-Stop Structure
oneStop.description: Designed as an integrated flow: Immigration (Administrative) + Disputes (Civil/Criminal) + Compensation (Damages)

practical.title: Settlement/Mediation Practical Approach
practical.description: Strong positioning in "resolution" rather than escalating cases (especially effective for traffic/industrial/unpaid/family matters)

global.title: Global Communication
global.description: Structured procedures and documents in ways that multicultural/foreign clients can easily understand

contact.title: Consultation & Information

location.label: Location
location.address: 2F Sejoong Building, 45 Wongok-ro, Danwon-gu, Ansan-si, Gyeonggi-do
